5. Calls on all parties to respect the cessation of hostilities, prevent Blue Line violations, and cooperate with UNIFIL.

6. Welcomes the Tripartite Mechanism's role in de-escalating tensions and building trust.

7. Urges respect for UNIFIL's safety and freedom of movement, and cooperation between UNIFIL and Lebanese Armed Forces.

8. Urges parties to cooperate towards a permanent ceasefire and long-term solution as envisioned in resolution 1701 (2006).

9. Urges Israel to withdraw from northern Ghajar without delay.

10. Reaffirms the call for an area free of armed personnel and weapons between the Blue Line and Litani River.

11. Welcomes efforts to implement zero-tolerance policy on sexual exploitation and abuse.

12. Requests the Secretary-General to report on implementation of resolution 1701 (2006) every four months.

13. Stresses the importance of a comprehensive, just, and lasting peace in the Middle East.

14. Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
